ProducerCommission.name: ProducerCommission
ProducerCommission.description: Represents a producer's commission for an insurance policy. The commission can be calculated from the commissionable transactions or can be populated from an external system.

CommissionAmount.description: The calculated commission amount for the insurance policy transaction.

CommissionStatementLineItemId.description: The Commission Statement Line Item corresponds to the Producer Commission

CommissionableAmount.description: The amount on which the commission is applied. This can be a transaction amount or a portion of the premium.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

InsurancePolicyAssetId.description: The insured item for which the commission was calculated.

InsurancePolicyCoverageId.description: The ID of the policy coverage for which the commission was calculated.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The insurance policy for which the commission was calculated.

InsurancePolicyTransactionId.description: The transaction for which the commission record was created.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the producer commission.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PaymentDatetime.description: The date on which the commission was paid.

ProducerAllocationAmount.description: The revenue amount to be received by the producer associated with the producer commission of Book of Business type.

ProducerId.description: The producer, broker, brokerage, or other user who receives the commission.

ProducerSplitArngLineItemId.description: The Producer Split Arrangement Line Item corresponds to the Producer Commission

ProducerSplitAssignmentId.description: The Producer Split Assignment corresponds to the Producer Commission

SourceSystem.description: The system from which the producer commission record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the producer commission record in the source system. This field is unique within your organization.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the commission payment.

Type.description: Specifies the type of commission paid to a producer, account, or contact for a commissionable transaction.
